website_summaries.verdict: A hard-wearing and durable tableware set, featuring 24 stainless steel, enamel-coated elements suitable for four diners.
pros: Lightweight set that is easy to transport
Enough tableware to feed four diners including four plates, four bowls, cutlery and four mugs
Stainless steel construction that is coated in a durable, rustproof enamel coating
cons: May damage enamel if not completely dry before storing

customer_reviews.title: CONTAINS LEAD AND "OTHER CHEMICALS"
customer_reviews.text: THIS CONTAINS "LEAD AND OTHER CHEMICALS" No where on the ordering page does this warning appear, and yet, on the box, there it is. Use at your own risk should not apply to things people eat with.
customer_reviews.author: hlhs mama

customer_reviews.title: Contains lead!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this item for our family camper. When I looked at the label, it listed lead amongst other harmful chemicals that are in this product. How on earth they allow lead and harmful chemicals in something that is specially going to touch your food and mouth is beyond me. Outrageous.
customer_reviews.author: Firefighter

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Seems likea good product for the price. Nice shiny enamel coating. Light weight and good to go. Its a set for 4 people - 4 plates..4 bowls .. 4 mugs... And four sets of cutlery.
customer_reviews.author: Aditya Khanna

customer_reviews.title: the bowls are fine (they appear small but are deep) and the coffee ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and well packed. After reading the mixed reviews, I wasn't sure what to expect. For me and my needs, This set will work well. The plates are decent size, the bowls are fine (they appear small but are deep) and the coffee mugs are normal size (for camping). The utensils may be a little flimsy, mainly the plastic. I haven't used them yet so I honestly can't rate them. The ceramic coating was not chipped and looks really nice except for one plate. The plate has a darker spot (shadow) but for me it's fine. Overall, this is a nice set and I may actually get one more.
customer_reviews.author: keith Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for camping!
customer_reviews.text: We love our camping dishes! The only problem is that 2 of the cups have weird spots where the enamel is chipped on the outside and on the inside. I guess they will each get holes there soon. And rust if we dont dry them immediately. All the other pieces are great. And my 4 year old loves to wash them.
customer_reviews.author: Candice McClusky

customer_reviews.title: Dishes are awesome. Silverware not so much.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this set. It is more cost effective than buying the enamel dishes individually. The mugs are great since they have the stainless rim around the edge. We have used them a few times and do not have a single wear mark in the enamel. If I would say one negative about the set, it would be the silverware. It is pretty cheap and flimsy. I do not expect it to last long. Plus having a plastic handle on the end is not very helpful while using it near the campfire or stove. I replaced it with all stainless silverware after the first use.
customer_reviews.author: Leah-michelle K. Ramanujan

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these a little over a month ago. Used them on one trip and a few of the pieces were defective. Enamel is chipped off of two of the large plates and the stainless steel edging is coming off. Outside of the return window otherwise these would go back. I expected more from these despite the low price.
customer_reviews.author: David Braeger

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, sturdy and over time a good value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: My picnic table never looked so good! Don't rely on the knives as they are pretty much worthless unless you are cutting softened butter. Still, this set is valuable. It stands up to dings and heavy use. When we are working on our future farm and camping out on the land it's nice to have sturdy tableware instead of disposable plates that are bad for the environment and fill up the trash bag. I'd have to wash dishes at home so no biggie to wash them outdoors also. It's nice to "set" the table and welcome the family to sit down for a meal after a busy day working on the land.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon  M. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, nice sized plates, bowls, cups. Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Love this camping set! Cups, bowls and plates are good quality, beautiful blue speckled and nice size. The silverware is very cheap but for the price it was cheaper to buy it this way and I can toss the silverware. We did take it camping and I loved how easy they were to wash. When you are washing in a bucket, at a campground, it's great when the food comes off easily. We have a family of 6 and I bought 2 sets. Should buy 1 more set for next camping year. These are so cute I want to use them in my kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Tessa

customer_reviews.title: Great set, awesome price
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this dish set!!! They look much nicer in person than the pictures show. They are sturdy good pieces that should last a long time. They are very typical to this type of camping dishes. If you've ever had been camping and used the metal.type dishes you know what the are. I will say these particular dishes seem very nice and not cheap. Very happy ibought 2 of these sets for my family. If my opinion or experience with these changes with time and amount of use of them I will update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Tuesday

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I’m not a usual review writer, but I will say this product was everything I expected. For the products that are rusting any kind of camping sets you purchase like this will rust if you don’t care for them properly. The product I got is durable and will seem to hold up for a long time! It looks exactly like pictured and definitely worth the price. Again, if it isn’t taken care of properly, of course it’ll rust. But take care of it and it’ll do a wonderful job for a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete product
customer_reviews.text: When preparing for an upcoming camping trip we reviewed and decided to purchase this product. It arrived with 2 sets of spoons and no forks (rest of the items were correct). Frustrating to say the least considering this seller does not have a feedback process to try and rectify and it isn't worth the hassle of returning the entire package just to obtain 4 forks. As for the product itself, they are very lightweight and so far have been easy to clean. One concern that we will figure out once we are on the trail is the durability, while cleaning the plates there was considerable "give" as it felt like they were bending out of shape.
customer_reviews.author: BluNu

customer_reviews.title: Good dishware, crummy utensils
customer_reviews.text: The dishware is great--exactly what I had hoped for an expected in enamel dishware for camping. The utensils, however, were pretty low quality. The metal is weak and there's not enough of a tang extending into the plastic handle, so it leaves the overall piece feeling very flimsy. Just trying to use the side of a fork on a biscuit started bending the metal. The set is still a decent cost for the dishware so I would've purchased anyway, just prepare to buy better utensils if you buy.
customer_reviews.author: Papercrane

customer_reviews.title: Best quality and price.
customer_reviews.text: These are available in green, unlike others. They are light, sturdy and my set had no chips or defects. The stainless edges are very nice and I like that feature, especially since the edges have more protection against chipping and rusting. The flatware is ok, but probably will not last as long as the dishes and cups, but will work perfectly for camping. These are the best quality and price I’ve seen. In the future a carry/ pack case would be nice. I made my own.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Russo

customer_reviews.title: Great for camping and the price.
customer_reviews.text: I won't beat these up because of the price, with as much as you get for the price (4x forks, knives, spoons, bowls, plate, and mugs) it's hard to beat. They appear to be enameled in the classic campsite blue speckle, appear to be sturdy and are lighter than I anticipated which is great if you're a backpacker or concerned about weight. The mugs are not insulated or thick walled; a hot cup of coffee will heat up the outside and the handle to the point where it's uncomfortable to hold. Otherwise a solid set for the price of your expectations are aligned.
customer_reviews.author: Big Dave

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat it for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This set is perfect for camping and/or as a spare set for a cabin or travel trailer. The enamel is applied evenly and looks nice. The metal is fairly lightweight, but definitely thick enough for typical use. The flatware isn't the greatest quality, but it is more than sufficient for its intended purpose. For the money, you simply can't beat this set.
customer_reviews.author: Browncoats Unite!Top Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: Horrible quality. Received it with cracks, chips and exposed metal. The utensils seemed flimsy. Will be retunring this.
customer_reviews.author: uhhdorkable

customer_reviews.title: Decent, Good value for price
customer_reviews.text: Nice but not great. Drink your coffee quickly from these cups as they won't hold the heat at all. Bowls are more the cereal size that pasta size. Plates have nice deep reservoir good for stew type things over a starch or keeping gravy on the plate. These cleaned easily. The silverware is very schlocky, not up to the quality of the plates.
customer_reviews.author: Q

customer_reviews.title: Ligtweight and Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed with my new camping dining set! It's so cute and nostalgic looking to me. The metal was not as thick as I had imagined, but with packing/hauling it's actually really nice how lightweight they are! I also bought the Stansport 8 cup percolator and mug set so we have 8 mugs total. It's really elevated my camping game having this gorgeous enamel set. Can't wait to use them for the second time this weekend!!
customer_reviews.author: Patchouli Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Decent not great
customer_reviews.text: Bought quickly for a 4 day camping trip. Can't really beat it for the price but silverware is a bit on the cheap side. The plastic handle aren't the best quality and the metal easily bends. Plates had a few dings and chips, which is expected but not on our first camping trip. Overall not a bad purchase but would invest more money in a better set in the future
customer_reviews.author: Dog Boss

customer_reviews.title: Useless and gross.
customer_reviews.text: These are incredibly difficult to clean. The silver rim of the dishes pinch fibers off the sponge or whatever yo u use to wash them and looks disgusting. The mugs conduct heat like CRAZY and are next to useless for hot coffee. The enamel has started to chip off after only a few uses. The silverware is cheap. Do not buy this for camping. I'm replacing the whole set with a plastic set that will ve easier to clean and insulate from heat better.
customer_reviews.author: Sommer

customer_reviews.title: havent used yet, but im impressed
customer_reviews.text: i just got this kit and have not yet gone camping with it yet, but what a great set. it has everything you need, it wont break, it matches my coffee pot too lol. if i have any issues with it in the future, i WILL come back here and let you know - otherwise, assume i'm still perfectly happy!
customer_reviews.author: jared

customer_reviews.title: Peeling after a few washes
customer_reviews.text: These were washed a few times and already peeling. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: livi

customer_reviews.title: and were just as good as any other camping set I've seen
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it's cheap, flimsy metal. If you're buying a dish set for $1/piece, I'm not sure what you're expecting. I actually found the dishes exceeded my expectations, and were just as good as any other camping set I've seen. The silverware was easily bent, but shouldn't suffer under proper treatment. Overall, a great value for camping dishes.
customer_reviews.author: Peter B.

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely more low-quality camping tableware. Durable, but pretty thin, not heat-resistant (so the cup/bowl/plate get very hot if hot items are put inside). BUT, for the price you pay it's a perfect set for a family camping trip. I would not have wanted to spend a high amount of money on a super quality cup my kids might break or lose on a camping trip.
customer_reviews.author: jp

customer_reviews.title: well...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for camping and for using in the RV. However, when we want to microwave something I can't put these metal plates or bowls in the microwave. They are also not dishwasher safe. I think we made a mistake and should have thought this through.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Ingram

customer_reviews.title: So nice...except for the silverware!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these cups, bowl and plates for camping but the silverware is awful, cheap plastic handle that comes with a nice stainless steel set makes no sense. Fail. I still love the rest of the set but it will need new silverware, so close to perfect!
customer_reviews.author: J. Mills

customer_reviews.title: Almost 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I used them on a recent camping trip and they were great except for the shiny metal rim they have around a cups and plates that gives them a coin like metal odor that I didn't like. If it weren't for that I would give them five stars.. aside from that the plates are very good size to fit a full meal and the cups are wonderful, loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Monica B.

customer_reviews.title: The silverware is very cheap and bends easily, but it would work for camping which is ...
customer_reviews.text: One of the mugs came chipped and flaking enamel, otherwise its a decent set for the price. The silverware is very cheap and bends easily, but it would work for camping which is why I bout this. I returned the set and reordered another one which hasn't arrived yet. Hopefully it will be in better condition.
customer_reviews.author: Aly Kate

customer_reviews.title: We are avid campers and this fit our need perfectly ...
customer_reviews.text: We are avid campers and this fit our need perfectly without spending a lot of money. If you are looking for luxury China look elsewhere. If you are looking for luxury China to go camping, stop going camping. If you really expect to get luxury China for this price turn your phone off and spare us all and never go in public.
customer_reviews.author: ec318

customer_reviews.title: Spoons suck!!
customer_reviews.text: The spoons are flat. Cant even really eat with them... Plus walmart has the whole set with bag for cheaper..
customer_reviews.author: Eneka D. Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Clean and Super Cute!
customer_reviews.text: This dish set isn't super heavy duty, but it is super lightweight and easy to clean, which are essentials for me when backpacking and camping. The design and coloring is really cute too, makes me feel classy even when I'm lost out in the woods getting eaten alive by mosquitoes!
customer_reviews.author: Leah Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Enamel is all bubbled and silver ware is falling apart out of the box. Returning not worth getting a replacement for such cheap quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Jesse

customer_reviews.title: I Am Very Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I just opened the box up and washed everything in the dishwasher. It feels like good quality tableware for camping. I am happy with the purchase. What they claim is true; everything is very light. A must when camping or hiking. I would buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Mark N.

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a huge fan of the enamel coated camping style tableware and was so excited to get these! So nice to not have to bring big stacks of paper plates on camping trips. They clean easily and don't take up much room
customer_reviews.author: Willfargo

customer_reviews.title: Fully functional set
customer_reviews.text: I really like the set. It is not for microwave. I have it in my camper and like that it is light weight and doesn't take a lot of space. Everything is fully functional. Not fancy. I am not fond of paper plates so great for me.
customer_reviews.author: Gary A. Paquin

customer_reviews.title: Must have camping gear!
customer_reviews.text: Really great product! We have these in a container ready to go for camping ao that we dont forget it! I have put the mugs directly on the fire to warm up my coffee and they work great and are great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel M.

customer_reviews.title: Do not wash in dishwasher!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed when it arrived. But after running them in the dishwasher they changed colors and texture. Would like to exchange for another pair and just not wash in the dishwasher but no way to contact seller
customer_reviews.author: Chase Cottam

customer_reviews.title: seems sturdy enough. Nothing chipped off
customer_reviews.text: Light, seems sturdy enough. Nothing chipped off. Cups are small - so if you need 16oz coffee for breakfast you have to go bigger. Maybe holds 8oz. Silverware flimsy but good enough for light use at a picknick. For camping just replace the silverware with one piece IKEA for 5 bucks and you will have a nice set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Stainless Steel also contains Lead
customer_reviews.text: The product description clearly states they start with durable stainless steel then enamel it. This is false it is enameled steel (which will rust quickly where the enamel wasn't properly applied and anywhere else the enamel chips) with a stainless steel decorative band added later. That combined with the contains lead and other chemicals warnings stated on the product box makes me not trust the product very much.
customer_reviews.author: A. J.

customer_reviews.title: Our now favorite daily dishes
customer_reviews.text: We have our China for special occasions. And we've had our Corelle for daily use....and now also these! I've noticed everyone opts for these. Maybe bc they're the new thing. But my family quickly voices their opinions when they don't like something. We love the color, and they are durable enough. Not heavy, but what one would expect for the price. We don't use the flatware.
customer_reviews.author: Hypatia

customer_reviews.title: save our planet
customer_reviews.text: thanks to amazon free shipping i was abke to order this item we love to go camping and always take our own dishes from home now we will have a uniqe set for our camping time!! very light weight and very easy to clean and the most important thing it will reducw tha plastic use and will save our planet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I bought these thinking it was the good ol heavy duty camp sets my family had when i was a kid. was i wrong everything is light weight the bowls,plates,cups do there job. But the silverware is junk. before you need it and can still return it take it out of the box, kinda like a stiffened piece of fiol. return it buy the better quality
customer_reviews.author: james borders

customer_reviews.title: We love ours
customer_reviews.text: Use them all the time while camping. They have held up well. They are very nastalgic with the blue. There is one chip in one of them not sure how we did it but none of the other do so it might be a fluke. The rings around the edges have not rusted either. We love them! Not heavy either.
customer_reviews.author: AliciaC

customer_reviews.title: Best price/quality ratio
customer_reviews.text: Actually I expected a low quality product. But it was a mistake. The enameled coating is very good without any flaws. It is thin but durable and most important is healty. Forks, knifes and spoons have plastic handles and they are thin. But it is not important for me. Use this set instead of plastic ones for your health.
customer_reviews.author: Erkan A.

customer_reviews.title: Chipping, breaking, unhappy
customer_reviews.text: First time used them on a camping trip. We had washed them when they had arrived then packed them up and used them for the first time within a week of receiving them. At first they seemed ok, but then we noticed things in our food and chewed something in our foods. Upon investigating where these slivers of blue, we noticed breaks in the enamel, and missing parts of the dishes. Trying the other pieces we came to the same conclusion. The dining set was chipping, breaking, and we became unhappy with the result. I would recommend other choices or more sturdy sets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not food safe
customer_reviews.text: I would have never bought if I knew it had a Cancer warning on them!
customer_reviews.author: niq hill

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Great for the money. Not the thickest of materials but still very nice. Reminds me of the old porcelain ware that my grandparents had, only with much cheaper materials that may not hold up for a long period.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bell

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly lightweight but looks sturdy, I looked it over and appears well made, no chips or defects found. The knives look like they can cut well too. Great set! Can’t wait to use this!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Camper tableware
customer_reviews.text: The plates, bowls and cups are good. I don't think the silverware will hold up forever though. They are fine now but it just feels like they will fail where the tool portion meets the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Great for Camping!
customer_reviews.text: This camping tableware set is great! We used this for our first family camping trip, and the plates are very well made, and held up to the abuse my four and two year old put them through. All the items are very easy to clean, and are study. The silverware worked well for a camping set, and are way better than some of the cheap sets you can buy at the store. Overall I would recommend this set, and will be purchasing another to have more than 4 of everything.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Chistopher

customer_reviews.title: Good, CHEAP set
customer_reviews.text: Forks and knives are already losing their plastic handgrip on them. Wibbly and wobbly. Cups are smaller than I thought they would be, which meant for me that the handle wasn’t that big and slightly uncomfortable to use.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Love this set!
customer_reviews.text: This set exceeded my expectations. They are lovely, lightweight, and durable. I just love them! I got the set in blue. I am considering buying a second set just to have on hand for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie S

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set and great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic set! Way better than we expected, quality wise and how it looks. Very light weight, but strong. It looks really good and the blue color is amazing. We're would buy this again, without a doubt!
customer_reviews.author: Martin Boonstoppel

customer_reviews.title: I love this set
customer_reviews.text: I love this set, but i had to order other dishes too, because I totally forgot when I bought these that they cannot go in the microwave. No metal in the microwave, so that leaves this set out for reheating dishes on the plate. Keep that in mind!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopping Guy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight and good design. Not really something you'd take backpacking, but works great for car camping. Cool, classic look. I don't think they will last me forever, but I think they will be good for at least the next few years and I consider that a good deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: dsailer

customer_reviews.title: Only complaint is it doesn't come with mesh bags
customer_reviews.text: I love these, they look really nice and are perfect for camping. The only complaint I have is that it doesn't come with mesh bags. I bought these for my daughter and me when we camp with her girl scout troop. We have to have a mesh bag so we can hang them to dry after washing, so I had to purchase those separate. Otherwise, I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Indy mom

customer_reviews.title: A good set
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cool camping dish set. I typically use paper plates, but wanted an actual dish set instead. Everything in the set seems super durable, minus the utensils. The utensils don't seem super sturdy, but I think they will be ok. I will say this set is surprisingly lightweight, so it won't weigh down you camping gear. The colors are bright and the plates/bowls are of normal size and not the typically tiny camping ones. It's a nice set overall.
customer_reviews.author: Grassshopper021

customer_reviews.title: ) They are pretty good, I wish there were more colors available
customer_reviews.text: Got these for camping obviously when I forgot twice to pack coffee mugs, ooopps. :) They are pretty good, I wish there were more colors available. The biggest downfall is that the cup itself gets VERY hot so you have to wait a LONG time to be able to drink your coffee and they literally hold about 8 ounces of coffee which is much less than what im used to so drinking two cups of coffee takes a very long time when you have to wait for it to cool.
customer_reviews.author: HollyDolly

customer_reviews.title: Great product, fast ship
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for to leave in my camper. Previous years we've used a plastic set, but I wanted something sturdier. Love the color, durability and ease of cleaning. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel W

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: These are good for the money. Flatware is pretty lite weight, didnt care about that tho. The finish seems pretty thin I guess? Used it on two trips so far. No real complaints
customer_reviews.author: jsherriff

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: Used this set for the first time this weekend. Worked out great! Plates, bowls, and cups all are very sturdy. Coating is great, but honestly can’t speak on how long lasting it will be.
customer_reviews.author: Joe S.

customer_reviews.title: Just what we were looking for
customer_reviews.text: This set Is just what we were looking for! We needed something not too heavy yet sturdy for camping and hunting. This set is all of that, plus it looks great! The cups are a nice size for coffee in the morning. It doesn't take up much room if you are packing in. The online price is great as well! We found very similar sets In the stores at a much higher price.
customer_reviews.author: K.Troche

customer_reviews.title: Glamping kinda vibes!
customer_reviews.text: Camping is a vibe with this camping set! My boyfriend and I love them. Honestly they are East to clean and light. The durability of the silver wear is okay but they are very light and perfect for camping not your kitchen... love the color too.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah Oelke

customer_reviews.title: Full set.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for my boyfriend for his camping trailer and he loves it. I thought it was a little light weight but he is delighted with the set and has already washed them and put them in the trailer. He is very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: momchurch7

customer_reviews.title: Product Contains Lead!!!
customer_reviews.text: Says tight on the box that it contains chemical and lead which cause cancer. Do not buy this crap under any circumstance. Things like this should be illegal to sell.
customer_reviews.author: Robert P. Maloney

customer_reviews.title: Won't last long
customer_reviews.text: I used these for a camping trip with my boys and on the second day the metal trim piece on the cup came loose and by day 3 it fell off completely. They look good and work well but don't expect them to last long although it looks like it was purely for looks and the cup can still be used without the metal trim ring.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Barclay

customer_reviews.title: Happy Camper
customer_reviews.text: I always took paper plates , plastic cups, etc...when camping. But not anymore! These work great, look great and didn't mind washing them. They gave a feel of home while sitting and eating together. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: But these worked great. Silverware was a little on the cheap side
customer_reviews.text: After reading the other reviews I was skeptical. But these worked great. Silverware was a little on the cheap side. But the service ware worked great. Hand washed it while we were camping. Once we got home, ran it through the dishwasher and it came out just fine. No nicks or chips that I could see. Worked great for my 4 small children while we were out. Would recommend this to anyone looking for something inexpensive, easy to clean and care for while camping.
customer_reviews.author: Norush

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THEM.
customer_reviews.text: I will be frank - I got these cause they're CUTE and oh boy they are. I have 4 extra mugs from the same company and since I now have 7 too many of these, I use some of them for other uses like herb plant holder, pencil holder and etc etc. They seem durable (time will tell), very light and again.. CUTE.
customer_reviews.author: Jinah Lee

customer_reviews.title: Dishes are great, silverware sucks.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality plates mugs and bowls. The silverware is cheap and unusually large. Overall great value considering some pleats sets alone go for more than the whole set
customer_reviews.author: tylerc

customer_reviews.title: Junk.
customer_reviews.text: Thin junk. Returning. Wouldn't have bought if could see product in person.
customer_reviews.author: Am. Cust.

customer_reviews.title: Other than the utensils, perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Classic look, sturdy, but the utensils are weak. Still worth the price, just be prepared to get a better utensil set.
customer_reviews.author: T.J. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Good for occasional use
customer_reviews.text: The plates, bowl and cups are good quality, but the flatware is cheap and I don't expect it to last long. (stamped metal with plastic handle. Overall, worth the price, but I expect to replace parts after a few uses.
customer_reviews.author: zaenglein

customer_reviews.title: No problems for me so far. Amazon really cares about customer service and support
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for camping. Hand washed them. No damage so far. Amazon was wonderful in helping me get this when the 1st company I ordered through ended up being a scam company. Very happy Amazon came through as these are a definite benefit for camping.
customer_reviews.author: Nicky

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought one set to see if I liked them, I liked them so much I bought a second set. I saw the same set at Big 5 but the price was significantly higher. They are very sturdy and the blue is very attractive. Definitely happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Debs

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Dishes great. Silverware made it one trip and no good. Nicely priced though compared to everywhere else. Still worth it.
customer_reviews.author: yates7265

customer_reviews.title: 98% good.
customer_reviews.text: bends. In the set is great but the silverware could be better. Hate the cheap plastic handles. Overall a good buy though.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Camping must have
customer_reviews.text: Great for camping. Easy to clean and don’t have to worry about buying paper plates, cups or plastic ware
customer_reviews.author: joshua

customer_reviews.title: Nice stuff!  except for the silverware....
customer_reviews.text: I got these for a GREAT price on Amazon and couldn't be happier! Very decent camp set, the tables, bowls and cups seem very nicely made. The silverware however is why I deduct one star as the quality on that front is very cheap feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Crookedsky

customer_reviews.title: Price and Durability
customer_reviews.text: Great product easy to clean strong love the set its a set for four and I just think it’s perfect better then the cheap plastic sets you see.
customer_reviews.author: roger karels

customer_reviews.title: Very low quality
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this set. We needed something inexpensive for our camper, so I tried to keep in mind that the motivating factor was price, not quality. However, all of the plates were warped, the bowls are tiny, and the enamel seemed to warp after the first cup of coffee I had in a mug. It's functional but in hindsight, I might have spent more for a nicer set.
customer_reviews.author: aggie613

customer_reviews.title: This set is amazing for the price
customer_reviews.text: This set is amazing for the price! Have used it several times now when camping and would highly recommend it. The silverware is a bit flimsy, but who cares, really. Overall it is great quality and a bang for your buck. I'm happy to have it as part of our camping gear.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly White

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Nice dishes. Utensils are a bit cheap but they work for camping. Works great for camping
customer_reviews.author: Gravic

customer_reviews.title: Love this set!
customer_reviews.text: Loved these! Added them to my camping kit and super happy tht I did. Also have received compliments from friends who I’ve gone camping with. The cups kept drinks soo cold which is always a plus.
customer_reviews.author: A Apodaca

customer_reviews.title: We haven't had a lot of chances to use this ...
customer_reviews.text: We haven't had a lot of chances to use this gear yet but for the price, you can't go wrong. And you are not polluting the planet by throwing away paper plates and plastic utensils and cups. Win-Win for people and the environment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for camping.
customer_reviews.text: Good value. Lightweight, easy to clean and pack. Inwish the cups were a little thicker, but they're ok.
customer_reviews.author: Connor McElveen

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Damaged
customer_reviews.text: I bought these back in July and just now got around to opening the box for a camping trip. I opened the box to find that the metal was bent on about 4 of the dishes, causing the enamel to crack off. The enamel is still flaking around the damaged areas so I'm not even sure if they're safe to use. Looks like I'm stuck with them now the return window has long passed.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Got what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my Girl Scouts to make several mess kits. The durability is great and the coloring is spot on. The set is as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Dishes are awesome
customer_reviews.text: The silverware pretty much suck but the dishes are awesome I wanna buy a couple more sets just to use the dishes but I threw away the silverware to prevent them breaking when I needed them and bought more heavy duty stuff
customer_reviews.author: Lucas C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice plateware
customer_reviews.text: Plateware is of good quality and nice. Utensils are subpar, plastic grips and the metal is very plain.
customer_reviews.author: Paul K.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: This set was exactly what I was expecting! Great quality. The silverware set is on the low end of quality, but I bought this set for the bowls, plates, and cups. They are stylish looking and I know will hold up with my four kids! I am buying another for myself and mother-in-law!
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: Love these for our pop up. Lightweight, easy to clean and look great. Reminds me of camping when I was a kid.
customer_reviews.author: upstatechic

customer_reviews.title: Very nice tableware set, and great for camping!
customer_reviews.text: I've taken this tableware set camping twice so far, and I really like it. This tableware has yet to get chipped, and is very easy to rinse off when I'm camping. I also like that it has everything I need, including silverware and bowls. I am very satisfied with this tableware set.
customer_reviews.author: Holly J.

customer_reviews.title: Traditional Style Camping Dishes
customer_reviews.text: These are great camping dishes. They are perfect for what I purchased them for. They are easy to clean. The blue with the white sparkles bring back childhood camping memories. I would like to purchase one more set so I have enough dishes for my entire family.
customer_reviews.author: Etk

customer_reviews.title: For that price a few slight enamel imperfections acceptable.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for $7.90 on amazon! For that price a few slight enamel imperfections acceptable. Plates, cups and bowls are fine. Stamped steel knives and spoons OK but forks are awful. Rough and poorly cut. Keep rest and throw replace forks.
customer_reviews.author: S.P.

customer_reviews.title: If interested in bowls, plates and cups for good price-good bargain
customer_reviews.text: I really like plates, bowls and mugs; knives ok too but forks and spoons have rough edges and couldn’t use them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: We have only used these two or three times and they're corroding! I would not reccomend and wish our return window hadn't closed already.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Happy Camping!
customer_reviews.text: Lots of people complaining about this set, what did u expect for 30 dollars, I believe in you get what u pay for, I am giving this set 4 stars because its cheap and serves its purpose, I have 2 of these sets and yes the silverware is cheaply made but it works for us, the plates cups and bowls I do not have a problem with, I have 8 place settings now for 1/3 the price of GSI or another brand, we use this for camping not eating at a 5 star restaurant. Thank you Stansport, Happy Camping!
customer_reviews.author: Craig D.

customer_reviews.title: rusty set
customer_reviews.text: They do rust so be sure to dry them completely before put them back into the box. I am surprised since they are supposed to be very durable and not rust after one camping trip.
customer_reviews.author: rmisasa

product_meta.title: STANSPORT - Deluxe 24-Piece Enamel Tableware Set: Plates, Bowls, Mugs & Utensils
feature_bullets: High quality durable 24-piece steel tableware set with blue enamel finish
Place settings for four with brilliant stainless steel edges, lightweight and compact
Double coated blue glazed enamel for unparalleled durability
Ideal for family camping, recreational vehicles or home use
Set contains four 10.5” plates, four 6” bowls, four 12oz mugs, four flatware sets (spoon, knife, fork)

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
